Ask HN: What do you write in Meeting Titles
text:
I am a non-native English speaker currently residing in the US. As part of my job, I need to set up meetings day in and day out with Developers, QAs, Business Analysts, PM (Product and Project Managers). One thing I struggle at times is - What would be a near perfect title to put on the meeting invite to get their attention?.

Though I always put an agenda, the decisions to be made in the meeting as part of the meeting invite, I think a good title is what most invitees see when they look at their calendar. My idea of title is that, once they see the title , they should know the importance of the meeting, and also skip any unimportant ones to attend mine.

Any suggestions/thoughts based on what you use in your companies?

Show HN: Wrote an action camera/drone media organizer program
text: I've been using several action cameras and drones for the last 10 years, and never had a utility to make importing media from these devices easier. The software will sort media by date, location and importance, as well as apply LUT profiles to photos, export highlighted moments from a video to an .EDL file compatible with Resolve, and update cameras firmware.

title: Show HN: Codeium: Free Copilot alternative that works in Jupyter notebooks
text:
I'm Varun from the Codeium team. We are super excited to bring free AI-powered code autocomplete to standalone Jupyter notebooks, a dev environment that is currently underserved by existing solutions.

And in the spirit of Show HN, we have a playground version for anyone to try the tech in the browser without any installation (linked in the blog post)!
